examples: She made several interesting points in the article.
Ella hizo varios puntos interesantes en el artículo.
I take your point (= understand and accept what you are saying).
Entiendo tu punto (= entiendo y acepto lo que estás diciendo).
He's just saying that to prove a point (= to show his idea is right).
Solo dice eso para probar un punto (= para mostrar que su idea es correcta).
